item.title: How to add an arbitrary records to Kube-DNS
item.description: Everything started the other day when I wanted to overwrite some DNS records inside my Kubernetes cluster, but I could not find a straightforward way to make that happen, or at least at the first glance. As they say, The best way to learn something is getting your hands dirty with it. So I took the matters into my own hands and decided to dig deeper and I found some really interesting stuff and I decided to write about it.
